name: Biarritz
fun_fact: Fun fact: Biarritz became Europe's first surfing destination in 1957 when American screenwriter Peter Viertel brought a surfboard while filming a movie - now it hosts the world's longest-running surf competition and is the undisputed surf capital of Europe!
